sentences.en: A rush of air on my face woke me.
sentences.cn: 脸上吹过的气流惊醒了我。

sentences.en: Amy woke up to the sound of her doorbell ringing.
sentences.cn: 随着门铃叮当作响，埃米醒来了。

sentences.en: And yet, when they woke Jesus, he said to them, “Why are you afraid?
sentences.cn: 可是，他们叫醒主耶稣时，主耶稣对他们说：“你们这小信的人哪！

sentences.en: At dawn I woke him up and said we were leaving.
sentences.cn: 黎明时分，我把他叫醒，告诉他我们要走了。

sentences.en: Bob woke slowly to sunshine pouring in his window.
sentences.cn: 直到阳光从窗外泻入，鲍勃才慢慢醒来。

sentences.en: Chants from the drunken party-goers woke residents and the police were called.
sentences.cn: 酩酊大醉的聚会者唱歌吵醒了居民，有人报了警。

sentences.en: Have you ever woke up and forgot how to speak English?
sentences.cn: 你有过一觉醒来忘记怎么说英语的经历吗？

sentences.en: I woke up to the sound of larks chirruping.
sentences.cn: 百灵鸟的叽叽喳喳声把我给吵醒了。

sentences.en: One morning I woke up and felt something was wrong.
sentences.cn: 一天早上我醒过来后感觉有些不对劲。

sentences.en: Paul woke early, as was his wont.
sentences.cn: 保罗醒得很早，历来如此。

sentences.en: She slept deeply but woke early.
sentences.cn: 她睡得很熟但醒得很早。

sentences.en: She was still tired and sleepy when he woke her.
sentences.cn: 他叫醒她的时候，她仍然又累又困。

sentences.en: She woke to feel a searing pain in her feet.
sentences.cn: 她醒来感到脚上火辣辣地痛。

sentences.en: She woke to find her dark room lit by flashing lights.
sentences.cn: 她醒来时发现黑暗的屋子被闪烁的灯光照亮。

sentences.en: They slept till the alarm bleeper woke them at four.
sentences.cn: 他们一直睡到4点钟被寻呼机闹钟叫醒.

sentences.en: To my surprise, I woke up in my bed the next morning.
sentences.cn: 令我惊讶的是，第二天早上我醒来时发现在我的床上。

sentences.en: When he woke again he could hear soft music.
sentences.cn: 他再次醒来时，听见了轻柔的音乐声。

sentences.en: When Jock woke up and found you gone he went crazy.
sentences.cn: 乔克醒来发现你走了，他简直气疯了。

words.tran_cn: 唤醒；激发；使…复活（wake的过去式）

phrases.tran_cn: 紧紧跟随；随着…而来；作为…的结果；仿效
[物]尾流（由空气动力压力差产生的一对绕着翼尖的闭合涡旋）
维克森林（指美国北卡罗来纳州一城镇或大学）
维克森林大学（美国一所私立大学）
醒来，起床；开始警觉；开始了解真相

trans.tran_cn: 醒( wake的过去式 )，唤醒，唤起（记忆），使再次感觉到
